May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse **Source** [Pathfinder #156: The Apocalypse Prophet](/Sources.aspx?ID=36) pg. 75 **Price** 65,000 gp **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 --- This [adamantine](/Equipment.aspx?ID=374) [staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12) is fitted with mithral plates resembling battlements on a castle. Lesser cover, cover, and greater cover don't grant any bonus against your spell attacks or to saving throws against your spells that you cast from the staff.
  • **Cantrips** [_shield_](/Spells.aspx?ID=280), [_telekinetic projectile_](/Spells.aspx?ID=334)
  • **1st** [_gust of wind_](/Spells.aspx?ID=143), [_longstrider_](/Spells.aspx?ID=175)
  • **2nd** [_obscuring mist_](/Spells.aspx?ID=210), [_web_](/Spells.aspx?ID=374)
  • **3rd** [_fireball_](/Spells.aspx?ID=119), [_wall of wind_](/Spells.aspx?ID=367)
  • **4th** [_hallucinatory terrain_](/Spells.aspx?ID=145), [_solid fog_](/Spells.aspx?ID=290), [_wall of fire_](/Spells.aspx?ID=362)
  • **5th** [_cloudkill_](/Spells.aspx?ID=42), [_wall of stone_](/Spells.aspx?ID=365)
  • **6th** [_fireball_](/Spells.aspx?ID=119), [_wall of force_](/Spells.aspx?ID=363)
  • **7th** [_magnificent mansion_](/Spells.aspx?ID=183), [_prismatic spray_](/Spells.aspx?ID=233)
  • **8th** [_earthquake_](/Spells.aspx?ID=95), [_scintillating pattern_](/Spells.aspx?ID=267)
  • **9th** [_meteor swarm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=191)
